prerequisites: SendGrid account (free tier: 100 emails/day) OR SMTP server
SendGrid API key OR SMTP credentials
Handlebars for template rendering (npm install handlebars)

step_by_step.title: Install Dependencies
step_by_step.command: npm install @sendgrid/mail handlebars (or nodemailer for SMTP)

step_by_step.title: Create SendGrid Account
step_by_step.details: Sign up at sendgrid.com, verify email, get API key

step_by_step.title: Create Template Files
step_by_step.details: Create .hbs files for welcome, password-reset, etc.

step_by_step.title: Implement EmailService
step_by_step.details: Create sendgrid-service.ts with template loading and sending

step_by_step.title: Test with Sandbox Mode
step_by_step.details: SendGrid sandbox: emails don't actually send, logs only

step_by_step.title: Verify Domain (Production)
step_by_step.details: Add DNS records in SendGrid dashboard for domain authentication

step_by_step.title: Add Unsubscribe Links
step_by_step.details: Implement unsubscribe functionality (required for marketing emails)

security.api_keys: Never commit API keys - use environment variables
security.rate_limiting: Limit emails per user (e.g., max 5 password resets/hour)
security.content_security: Sanitize user-generated content in email templates

warnings: ⚠️ Verify domain in production to avoid spam folder
⚠️ Never send passwords in emails - only reset links
⚠️ Test emails thoroughly - typos in production emails are embarrassing
⚠️ Include plain text version for accessibility (screen readers)
lessons_learned: Use SendGrid for transactional emails (higher deliverability than SMTP)
Always include plain text version (improves spam score)
Inline CSS in emails (external stylesheets don't work in most email clients)
Test in multiple clients (Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail)
Use MJML framework for responsive emails (converts to inline CSS)
Track email opens/clicks with SendGrid analytics
Implement exponential backoff for failed email sends
Store email send history in database for debugging

testing.sandbox_mode: SendGrid sandbox: logs emails without actually sending
testing.test_email: Mailtrap.io for testing email content without real delivery
testing.email_clients: Test rendering in Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail
